hero.title: Safeturned
hero.subtitle: Protect your Unturned server from malicious plugins. Automatic code scanning for backdoors and vulnerabilities.

results.title: Analysis Results
results.notFoundDescription: The requested analysis could not be found. Please check the hash or upload a new file.
results.reanalyzeDescription: Want to reanalyze this file? Click the button below to get fresh results.

features.title: Safeturned Features
features.codeAnalysisDescription: Deep static analysis of plugin source code for suspicious patterns
features.threatDetectionDescription: Detection of backdoors, trojans and other malicious components in plugins
features.fastCheckDescription: Analysis results in seconds with detailed report of found issues

step1.title: Upload plugin
step1.description: Upload plugin file (.dll) through web interface

step2.title: Code analysis
step2.description: System analyzes code for suspicious functions and patterns

step3.title: Get results
step3.description: Get detailed report with security assessment and recommendations
